scripts.postinstall: ../../../../node_modules/.bin/tsc && rm -rf node_modules/jquery/src && rm -f node_modules/jquery/external/sizzle/dist/sizzle.js && rm -f node_modules/jquery/dist/core.js && mv -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js && rm -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim* && mv -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.map node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.map && rm -rf node_modules/d3/src && mv node_modules/d3/d3.min.js node_modules/d3/d3.js && rm -f node_modules/elkjs/lib/elk-worker.js node_modules/elkjs/lib/elk.bundled.js
